original_text: Then the priest shall wash his clothes, and he shall bathe his flesh in water, and afterward he shall come into the camp, and the priest shall be unclean until the even.
korean_text: 제사장은 자기의 옷을 빨고 물로 몸을 씻은 후에 진영에 들어갈 것이라 그는 저녁까지 부정하리라

sentences.original_text: Then the priest shall wash his clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 제사장은 자기 옷을 빨 것이며

sentences.original_text: and he shall bathe his flesh in water
and afterward he shall come into the camp
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그는 진에 들어올 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the priest shall be unclean until the even
